sentences.sentence: He heard the Rat call out warningly, "Come on, Toad!"
sentences.translation: 他听见水鼠兰特大声警告说：“跟上，癞蛤蟆托德！”

sentences.sentence: He heard the gentlemen call out warningly, "Be careful, washerwoman!"
sentences.translation: 他听见绅士们大声警告说：“小心，洗衣妇！”

sentences.sentence: He heard the gentlemen call out warningly, 'Be careful, washerwoman!'
sentences.translation: 后面的绅士大声警告说：“小心，洗衣婆！”
